summary: A FUEL SMELL ENTERS THE PASSENGER CABIN OF THE VEHICLE WHEN THE WEATHER IS COLD AND THE HEATER IS ON.  IT IS ALSO NOTICED WHEN THE AIR CONDITIONING IS ON.  THE SMELL CAUSES THE OCCUPANTS TO VOMIT OR BECOME NAUSEATED.   VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, WHO COULD NOT DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM. *AK   *JB     *NLM
